column4: I am having a wierd problem with X11, I am using an Nvidia card and It has two outputs, A DVI and a VGA. The DVI goes to my primary display and the VGA goes to my secondary. My problem is that its sending the Primary display to the secondary monitor, How do I reverse the outputs on my card?
one second and I can tell you how to fix that
ah well my solution may still work, hold on
Have you found the thing that will reverse the displays?
